text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Ah, Producer?
...You seem tired, huh?
Ah, sorry, sorry...

It's alright, Kogane.
You noticed, huh...?

Well, I do tend to notice when it's about
you, you know... But, um...
... It's because you're our Producer!
Thanks, Kogane.

Well, you know,
I got piled up with things I had to finish by yesterday...
I see...
haha...

I know I shouldn't burden
Kogane with these kinds of things...
I still have a lot to learn.
No, it's okay. I took a nap in the car during the break.
...But, a nap is just a nap, right?
Well, um... Did you have a proper meal?
Yeah, I had it in the car. I had a cereal bar and some milk...
...That's not good!
...Huh?

Well, those meals are convenient and all, but...
you should eat something warm, sitting at a table, right?
Kogane...
...Before we go back, let's have a proper dinner.

Eating at a table, not in the car,
and enjoying a warm meal...
You're doing great, Producer!

But, Kogane... today was a food report,
so I don't think you're that hungry, right?

I only ate what I needed
for the report, so I'm fine~!

...Yeah.
Thanks, Kogane.

Thanks for holding the seats.
What are you going to have, Kogane?

Hmm, then...
I'll have this white fish kasuzuke set.

Alright, I'll go with the ginger grilled set next to it.
Would you like a drink bar too?
Yeah, thanks.
What's wrong, Kogane?

Ah, um...
No, it's nothing.
...Really?

...Even though I insisted
on bringing you along, Producer...

In the end,
It feels like I'm the one getting looked after...

...I thought maybe Producer could've said
something like, "I'm tired", you know...
...Yeah.

You never complain about these things,
so I was just amazed by you!
